import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick"; const NextArrow = (props) =>{ const {onClick}=props return } const FlashCard = ({productItems}) => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 1, nextArrow: , prevArrow: , } return ( <> {productItems.map((productItems)=> { return(
{productItems.discount}% Off

{productItems.name}

{productItems.price}.00

) })} ) } export default FlashCard
